subject: Hopefull,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com

-------------------------------1241368018

If someone out there could/would make me a  radio or box that doesn't tick, 
and has a fast speed, I would pay them up front  for it and the work they 
do, I am not sure with ebay, because I want to know  that I am getting the 
right kind.  Thank you, SF
p.s. let me know, I will be more than glad to  pay for it up front with a 
good electronic's  person.
